newsitem.title: FRANCE: France sells 17.66 bln Ffr BTANs at auction.
newsitem.headline: France sells 17.66 bln Ffr BTANs at auction.

text.p: The Treasury sold the following government bonds (BTANs) at auction on Thursday.
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE
* PRICES ABOVE GOT ALLOTMENTS IN FULL NEXT AUCTION
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE
* PRICES ABOVE GOT ALLOTMENTS IN FULL NEXT OFFER
NOTE - The Treasury originally announced it would sell 16 to 18 billion francs of BTANs In total today. The total bid cover ratio of the auction was 2.7.
